name: Gallium Moore
tag_list: gallium-moore, galliummoore, conseil-en-leve-de-fonds, recherche-de-fonds, fusions-acquisitions, cleantech, biotech-lyon, information-technology, conseil-financier-lyon, albin-jourda, denis-campbell
overview:
Founded in 2004, Gallium Moore is an independent financial advisory firm providing corporate finance and business development services. Our professionals are combining the passion of an independent culture with the professionalism of experienced management. Operating through our three offices, our integrated team brings unique global perspective and focused industry expertise to our full service offerings in 3 main sectors :

  • Cleantech -Information technology
  • Medical

We support our clients on : Fund raising, disposals, acquisitions and business development.

Based in London, with offices in Paris and Lyon, we connect our clients with industrial and financial seekers through our international network
